alert.note: Alert for Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 10 at 12:37PM PDT until April 11 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PDT MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO 5 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, sustained west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the High Wind Warning, sustained west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Mojave Desert Slopes. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to Noon PDT Monday. For the High Wind Warning, from Noon Monday to 5 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult to impossible, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways affected include, but are not limited to Highway 14, Highway 58 below Tehachapi Pass, including the town of Mojave, and Highway 178 through and below Walker Pass.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
